name: CUBE9 ATTACK
description:
Simply rotate the top piece and drop it down to make a cube!
A speedy puzzle game with a perfect tempo and a great sense of exhilaration!

[ Awaken your instincts! ]
The rules are simple, so this game is perfect for killing idle time or clearing your head in between jobs.
Keep an eye on your average thinking time, so you can track your progress!
Sometimes there may even be more than one solution! Make your instincts shine!

[ Challenge Mode and Zen Mode ]
Play the game in Challenge Mode, where you tackle cubes that grow in size from 3 x 3 up to 9 x 9, or in Zen Mode, where the game does not stop if you make a mistake half way through.

[ Enjoy the game just as you want! ]
Share your speed or scores on social media, or enjoy a quiet and relaxing game for your own satisfaction.
